text:
When setting basedir from the command-line (-Dbasedir=...) the path is not 
processed properly.  I don't have all the details handy, but wanted to file 
this bug report as a reminder to look into further. (it has to do with property 
immutability, and basedir being set before the system properties pulled in).
creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com

text:
I thought the way to set basedir from the command-line (or a properties file, 
etc.) was to not define one in <project>.
creator: holtdl@yahoo.com
jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
I was not aware of this.  Is it documented anywhere?  It still seems wrong 
that -Dbasedir=some/other/dir is broken - and <ant> can reset the basedir also.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: In using.html, where the basedir attribute of project is described.
Since it's documented behaviour, I'm marking this INVALID.
creator: holtdl@yahoo.com
jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
Seems mighty odd that to "override" something like basedir that you have to 
edit your build.xml.  But I'll leave as INVALID for now as it is documented 
behavior.
